overview:
Judith A. Reinsdorf is executive vice president and general counsel for Tyco International. In this role, Reinsdorf is responsible for the companyâ€™s legal organization, which includes Corporate Governance, Compliance & Regulatory Affairs, Public Affairs and Environment, Health and Safety.

Reinsdorf joined Tyco in March 2007 after having served as vice president, general counsel and secretary of C. R. Bard, Inc., from October 2004 to February 2007. Previously, she served as vice president and corporate secretary for Tyco International from 2003 to 2004 and was vice president and associate general counsel at Pharmacia Corporation from 2000 to 2003. From 1995 to 2000, Reinsdorf held the position of assistant general counsel and then chief legal counsel, corporate at Monsanto Company.

relationships.title: Executive Vice President and General Counsel
